Description: when given input string is empty the value returned is 0
when given input string contains number 0 then output is zero
when given input string contains 2 numbers the sum is calculated and result is given as output
when given input string contains a negative number a system exception is thrown "No Negative Numbers are Allowed!"
when given input string contains newline character as a delimter should calculate the sum and return output
when given input string seperated by delimter contains a number greater it should be ignored and the sum should be calculated
given input string can have any delimeter or can contain multiple delimters consecutively this string when given as input should find all numbers in given string and calculate sum

Given input string if the string has any special character(#@%^  , whitespaces after \n it is considerd as invalid input and will throw exception "Not valid input: no special character allowed after delimter "\n"")
Expected Output: SystemException "Not valid input: no special character allowed after delimter "\n""
